clips.what_happens_visually: Dinesh and Gilfoyle are being introduced to a woman at a baseball game. Dinesh smiles politely. Gilfoyle looks bored.
clips.meme_caption:
When you’re 2nd to the CTO
but still gotta network
clips.why_it_works: Relatable awkwardness of being introduced at a networking event vs. the CTO.

clips.what_happens_visually: Gilfoyle makes a racist joke. Dinesh is visibly offended and starts yelling.
clips.meme_caption:
When the intern drops a racist joke
in the standup
clips.why_it_works: Captures the cringe of a problematic comment in a professional setting.

clips.what_happens_visually: Gavin Belson in a board meeting. He delivers a harsh review of the ad campaign.
clips.meme_caption:
When the CEO sees your
product demo
clips.why_it_works: Relatable fear of presenting work to a demanding CEO.

clips.what_happens_visually: Gavin Belson continues to rant about the ad campaign, becoming increasingly dramatic.
clips.dialogue_hook: I just got humiliated by a fucking teenager!
clips.meme_caption:
When your intern finds a major
security flaw
clips.why_it_works: Exaggerated reaction to a common tech problem.

clips.what_happens_visually: Gavin Belson continues his rant, getting more and more unhinged.
clips.dialogue_hook: All I care about is that Nucleus is better than Pied Piper!
clips.meme_caption:
Me at 3am after seeing a
competitor's launch
clips.why_it_works: Captures the manic energy of founders obsessed with their competition.

clips.what_happens_visually: Bachman and Richard in a meeting. A client describes the behavior as 'boorish and juvenile'.
clips.meme_caption:
Performance review season
is in full swing
clips.why_it_works: Relatable to anyone who's received less-than-stellar feedback.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich Bachman and Richard Hendricks in a meeting. A client describes the behavior as 'obscene, insulting, and ignorant'.
clips.meme_caption:
When your code review
gets a little too real
clips.why_it_works: Captures the pain of a brutal code review.

clips.what_happens_visually: Erlich Bachman and Richard Hendricks in a meeting. A client describes the behavior as 'rude, vulgar, and uncouth'.
clips.meme_caption:
When your boss describes
your presentation style
clips.why_it_works: Captures the pain of a brutal presentation review.

clips.what_happens_visually: Dinesh is trying to explain the meaning of the word 'bro' in different languages. It gets increasingly dark.
clips.meme_caption:
When you try to be woke
but it backfires
clips.why_it_works: Highlights the awkwardness of trying to be culturally sensitive and failing.

clips.what_happens_visually: Gavin Belson makes a comparison between billionaires and Jews in Nazi Germany. Everyone is shocked.
clips.dialogue_hook: Did you just compare the treatment of billionaires in America today to the plight of the Jews in Nazi Germany?
clips.meme_caption:
When the CEO compares
layoffs to the Holocaust
clips.why_it_works: The sheer audacity and inappropriateness of the comparison is shocking and funny.
